course_title: Introduction to Clinical Specialty: Adult-Gero Acute Care NP
class_notes: Section #1 is for Adult-Gero Acute Care students only. Online Asynchronous with some synchronous sessions on Wednesdays from 8am -10:50am. Clinical dates TBD.
course_description: Students will enroll in specialty specific sections of this course. Emphasis is on developing skills in health promotion, health maintenance, risk reduction strategies and understanding the basic health care needs of the  patient population to prepare for clinical practice.
sections: Class Nbr: 3021, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 9-11:50a, Instructor: Adamski/Brockett, Status: Open
